roleset.name: to reap or gather
roleset.note: HARVEST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'harvest' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from harvest.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Because only a fraction of them are ever prosecuted [*-1] , nobody really knows how much money bogus telemarketing operators really harvest [*T*-2].
